name: Canon Aim
description:
Canon Aim

Wait for the canon to aim

Shot to hit highest points

SPACE to shot

Made with Unity2D (~10 hours)

Graphics with Photoshop

Musics credits : 

  • Background music from "Ultimate Game Music Collection" Unity assets pack (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music...)
  • FX Sounds from "Universal Sound FX" Unity assets pack (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256)

Create in may 2021 (~10 hours)
